verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>coming<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G5461>illumined<s%> with his <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

And he <S%G2896>cried<s%> out with a <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4098>"Fallen,<s%> <S%G4098>fallen<s%> is <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great!<s%> And she has <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G2732>dwelling<s%> <S%G2732>place<s%> of <S%G1140>demons<s%> and a <S%G5438>prison<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and a <S%G5438>prison<s%> of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> and <S%G3404>hateful<s%> <S%G3732>bird.<s%>

"For <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> have <S%G4095>drunk<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>passion<s%> of her <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> and the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have <S%G4203>committed<s%> [acts of] <S%G4203>immorality<s%> with her, and the <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> have <S%G4147>become<s%> <S%G4147>rich<s%> by the <S%G1411>wealth<s%> of her <S%G4764>sensuality.<s%>"

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1831>"Come<s%> out of her, my <S%G2992>people,<s%> that you may not <S%G4790>participate<s%> in her <S%G266>sins<s%> and that you may not <S%G2983>receive<s%> of her <S%G4127>plagues;<s%>
for her <S%G266>sins<s%> have <S%G2853>piled<s%> up as <S%G891>high<s%> as <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3421>remembered<s%> her <S%G92>iniquities.<s%>

<S%G591>"Pay<s%> her <S%G591>back<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as she has <S%G591>paid,<s%> and <S%G1363>give<s%> <S%G1363>back<s%> [to her] <S%G1363>double<s%> <S%G1362><s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to her <S%G2041>deeds;<s%> in the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> she has <S%G2767>mixed,<s%> <S%G2767>mix<s%> <S%G1362>twice<s%> as <S%G1362>much<s%> for her.

"To the <S%G3745>degree<s%> that she <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G846>herself<s%> and <S%G4763>lived<s%> <S%G4763>sensuously,<s%> to the <S%G5118>same<s%> <S%G5118>degree<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> her <S%G929>torment<s%> and <S%G3997>mourning;<s%> for she <S%G3004>says<s%> in her <S%G2588>heart,<s%> 'I <S%G2521>sit<s%> [as] a <S%G938>queen<s%> and I <S%G1510>am<s%> not a <S%G5503>widow,<s%> and will <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3997>mourning.<s%>'

"For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> her <S%G4127>plagues<s%> will <S%G2240>come,<s%> <S%G2288>pestilence<s%> and <S%G3997>mourning<s%> and <S%G3042>famine,<s%> and she will be <S%G2618>burned<s%> up with <S%G4442>fire;<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G2919>judges<s%> her is <S%G2478>strong.<s%>

"And the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> who <S%G4203>committed<s%> [acts of] <S%G4203>immorality<s%> and <S%G4763>lived<s%> <S%G4763>sensuously<s%> with her, will <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G2875>lament<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> her <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of her <S%G4451>burning,<s%>

<S%G2476>standing<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of her <S%G929>torment,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>'Woe,<s%> <S%G3759>woe,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G4172>city!<s%> For in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> your <S%G2920>judgment<s%> has <S%G2064>come.<s%>'

"And the <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G3996>mourn<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> her, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G59>buys<s%> their <S%G1117>cargoes<s%> <S%G3765>any<s%> <S%G3765>more;<s%>

<S%G1117>cargoes<s%> of <S%G5557>gold<s%> and <S%G696>silver<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G3135>pearls<s%> and <S%G1039>fine<s%> <S%G1039>linen<s%> and <S%G4209>purple<s%> and <S%G4596>silk<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> [kind of] <S%G2367>citron<s%> <S%G3586>wood<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4632>article<s%> of <S%G1661>ivory<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4632>article<s%> [made] from <S%G5093>very<s%> <S%G5093>costly<s%> <S%G3586>wood<s%> and <S%G5475>bronze<s%> and <S%G4604>iron<s%> and <S%G3139>marble,<s%>

and <S%G2796>cinnamon<s%> and <S%G7011>spice<s%> and <S%G2368>incense<s%> and <S%G3464>perfume<s%> and <S%G3030>frankincense<s%> and <S%G3631>wine<s%> and <S%G1637>olive<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> and <S%G4585>fine<s%> <S%G4585>flour<s%> and <S%G4621>wheat<s%> and <S%G2934>cattle<s%> and <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> and [cargoes] of <S%G2462>horses<s%> and <S%G4480>chariots<s%> and <S%G4983>slaves<s%> and <S%G444>human<s%> <S%G5590>lives.<s%>

"And the <S%G3703>fruit<s%> you <S%G1939>long<s%> for has <S%G565>gone<s%> from you, and <S%G3956>all<s%> things that were <S%G3045>luxurious<s%> and <S%G2986>splendid<s%> have <S%G622>passed<s%> <S%G622>away<s%> from you and [men] will <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> them.

"The <S%G1713>merchants<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> who became <S%G4147>rich<s%> from her, will <S%G2476>stand<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5401>fear<s%> of her <S%G929>torment,<s%> <S%G2799>weeping<s%> and <S%G3996>mourning,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>'Woe,<s%> <S%G3759>woe,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> she who was <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G1039>fine<s%> <S%G1039>linen<s%> and <S%G4210>purple<s%> and <S%G2847>scarlet,<s%> and <S%G5558>adorned<s%> with <S%G5553>gold<s%> and <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G3135>pearls;<s%>

for in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G5118>such<s%> <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4149>wealth<s%> has been <S%G2049>laid<s%> <S%G2049>waste!<s%>' And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2942>shipmaster<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1909>passenger<s%> <S%G5117><s%> <S%G4126><s%> and <S%G3492>sailor,<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2038>make<s%> their <S%G2038>living<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance,<s%>

and were <S%G2896>crying<s%> out as they <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of her <S%G4451>burning,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>'What<s%> <S%G4172>[city<s%>] is <S%G3664>like<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> city?'

"And they <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G5529>dust<s%> on their <S%G2776>heads<s%> and were <S%G2896>crying<s%> out, <S%G2799>weeping<s%> and <S%G3996>mourning,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3759>'Woe,<s%> <S%G3759>woe,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4143>ships<s%> at <S%G2281>sea<s%> became <S%G4147>rich<s%> by her <S%G5094>wealth,<s%> for in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> she has been <S%G2049>laid<s%> <S%G2049>waste!<s%>'

<S%G2165>"Rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> her, O <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and you <S%G40>saints<s%> and <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2919>pronounced<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> for you <S%G1537>against<s%> her."

And a <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> up a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3457>millstone<s%> and <S%G906>threw<s%> it into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3779>"Thus<s%> will <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> be <S%G906>thrown<s%> down with <S%G3731>violence,<s%> and will not be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer.<s%>

"And the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of <S%G2790>harpists<s%> and <S%G3451>musicians<s%> and flute-players and <S%G4538>trumpeters<s%> will not be <S%G191>heard<s%> in you <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer;<s%> and <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5079>craftsman<s%> of <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G5078>craft<s%> will be <S%G2147>found<s%> in you <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer;<s%> and the <S%G5456>sound<s%> of a <S%G3458>mill<s%> will not be <S%G191>heard<s%> in you <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer;<s%>

and the <S%G5457>light<s%> of a <S%G3088>lamp<s%> will not <S%G5316>shine<s%> in you <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer;<s%> and the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> and <S%G3565>bride<s%> will not be <S%G191>heard<s%> in you <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>longer;<s%> for your <S%G1713>merchants<s%> were the <S%G3175>great<s%> <S%G3175>men<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G4105>deceived<s%> by your <S%G5331>sorcery.<s%>
"And in her was <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and of <S%G40>saints<s%> and of <S%G3956>all<s%> who have been <S%G4969>slain<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"
